name: Nightmare on Cube Street - alpha 0.3.0
description:
Shoot monster with "drum and bass " in the ears.

Commands:

  • Mouse wheel for change weapon (change the symbol above the gun)
  • Mouse click for shoot.

Weapons

  • Holy (blue cross): kill zombie cubes
  • Light (white sphere): kill vampire cubes
  • Siver (gray cube): kill werewolf cubes
